Class BallotDropLocation
In: lib/app/models/ballot_drop_location.rb
Parent: ActiveRecord::Base

Methods

precincts  

External Aliases

precincts -> precincts_builtin

Public Instance methods

precincts()

this finds both the precincts that explicitly use this ballot drop location and the precincts that use it implicitly, because they are in the same locality and do not specify a ballot drop location

[Source]

13:         def precincts
14:                 precs = precincts_builtin + Precinct.find(:all, 
15:                                                           :joins => "LEFT JOIN ballot_drop_locations_precincts jointable
16:                                                                             ON jointable.precinct_id = precincts.id",
17:                                                           :conditions => ["jointable.ballot_drop_location_id IS NULL AND
18:                                                                           precincts.locality_id = ?", self.id])
